title: Tea Caddy, late 18th century
medium: Porcelain with overglaze decoration of color and gilding
markings: Mark, underglaze blue (See catalog card for image): vertical line with two horizontal lines crossing it at one-third and two-thirds of its length and a short diagonal line at the top.
description: Rectangular with rounded shoulders and cylindrical neck. Vignettes of Chinoiserie figures in landscape, with gilded and painted imbricated borders.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tea Caddy, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Porcelain with overglaze decoration of color and gilding. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1938-57-653.
